name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, ezcmac, UntilYouAreSoNude, fosters, Moraiat, helikaon, chatterjee, dropkickpikachu)

name: deimosrising
text: In the intermediary period between this strip and this post, Fedor Emelianenko made the wall, and Mirko Crocop made it and was then kicked off.

name: farqussus
text: there is nothing Vague about the Easternness of those names' Extraction.

name: troy_convers
text: Hope Mariusz Pudzianowski's still on it.

name: genequagmire
text: Chubby for extensive MMA knowledge.

name: catachresis
text: Oh jesus look at Phillipe in the last panel oh christ nothing should be that adorable

name: closefriend
text: Philippe feels like Chicken Tonight.

name: songbirdspectre
text:
i don't even understand what the association between his action and being a tough guy is.


but i'll be damned if i don't love it.

name: foolio
text: I think he is flexing his biceps. Or, the otter version of biceps.

name: chachibenji
text: Otterceps.

name: foea
text: He's performing the Howard Dean Maneuver.

name: centipede_damascus
text: A comment left by centipede_damascus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ted0phile, dismas, GeyserShitdick, godfatherofsouls, Pie4me6, fmercury, Magb, Boyd, Rapid_Roy, mattylite)

name: straw
text:
You don't know that

YOU DON'T KNOW THAT

name: saucy_jack
text:
He does after all have that Chuck Norris poster in his home.

CRAZY SUNDAY

name: tekende
text: In another room he has the poster for the sequel: Crazy Sunday 2: Sunday Harder .

name: ssddr
text: I like how utterly baffled lie bot is when someone says something bizzare to him.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Yes! He finally gets a dose of his own snakeoil.

name: cicadalek
text: Come to think of it, Vlad lies almost as much as he does, although usually towards an apparent purpose.

name: luckypyjamas
text: his purpose usually seems to be self-interest, whereas lie bot lies just for the hell of it

name: sexualhomeboy
text: Said the T-Rex to the little beige dinosaur.

name: foetus_punch
text: Said the cat with his tongue lollin' all about.

name: luckypyjamas
text:
said the man in the hat covering his face in shame

fin.

name: hyetal
text: I was going to say the exact same thing, except I was going to use "flabbergasted" instead of "baffled."

name: jstegall
text: I think Sly Stallone would be afraid of Philippe.

name: backspac
text: HOLY CHRIST IS THAT AN ALIVE STUFFED ANIMAL

name: blarghamagarky
text: HOLY CHRIST THAT STUFFED OTTER IS HEADING TOWARDS ME ITS SNEAKERS ARE PLUGGED IN TO THE WALL WHAT THE HELL WHAT ARE ITS SNEAKERS SAYING OH GOD

name: deusoma
text: And then when you call a friend, they just think you're having a bad acid trip and they won't come out and help you unless you say nice things about their junk.

name: semiquaver
text: Your icon...ha ha.  Ha!  Ha ha ha!

name: ted0phile
text: This is what you call near-perfect avatar to comment synergy.

name: korukyu
text: Because Philippe is both a tough guy AND a special boy!

name: howard
text: Aw. Vlad is such nice robot.

name: jesler729
text: Or he is trying to persuade Phillipe to buy 10 sandwiches.

name: skoora
text: Lying to five year olds is a tactic commonly employed by the shrewdest of businessmen.

name: blarghamagarky
text: and parents

name: woodenteeth
text:
I have an ex-girlfriend who, to this day, holds it against her parents that they lied to her about Santa. She is serious and she has a very strong code about never inflicting this crime upon her own children.

That Christmas my mother got her a hat that said in festive writing "I STILL believe in SANTA!".

I love my mother.

name: tekende
text: Is that gift the reason the girl is now an EX-girlfriend?

name: woodenteeth
text: No, that was because she used the words "I want to give the customer a pleasant shopping experience".

name: rowboat
text: Maybe the least attractive thing a person could ever say.

name: woodenteeth
text: Aside from "I have recto-vaginal fistula".

name: tekende
text: That sounds like a euphemism for giving a customer a blow job. Was it?

name: woodenteeth
text: From memory that would have been giving the customer a "who the fuck cares about my wife and children I don't really need anything else" experience.

name: zaer
text: she's not that good!

name: woodenteeth
text: You sir, presumably, have not had her on your business end.

name: zaer
text:
And you break up with her? My god man who do you think you are?

...Unless she dumped you, then i'm sorry dude god do you want a hug i'm so sorry man.

name: woodenteeth
text: No. I dumped her. I have had much amazing consolitory head since then. I have been a lucky man in that department. Would like a left over. I'll grab my address book.

name: zaer
text:
Well... you do come across as a modern day Sam Malone.So uh I'll pretend you're lying about all of this, just so I wouldn't kill myself for being a lesser man.

I would, however, love some left over!

name: straw
text: I don't think it's a display of shrewdness on parents' parts to lie consummately to their five year olds, more of a kneejerk reaction.

name: dans
text: Lie-bot is angry his job is being outsourced.

name: deancain29
text: A comment left by deancain29 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Overmedicated, dominus101, Tragic_Johnson, miaou, Darthemed)

name: rowboat
text: Damn! I guess a couple of people really hated knowing that this was your first strip! How dare you!

name: chachibenji
text:
SCREW you for reading this strip! FUCK you!
Seriously!

name: vermy
text:
The issue is that he has about four or five "first achewood"
A dude doesn't hog those, man.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Could be every strip feels like the first one.

name: heccibiggs
text:
Every strip makes him feel

oh it makes him feel

shiny and new

name: snowman
text: chubbied just in defense of the lames.

name: woodenteeth
text: Does anyone else have a weird sensation that Lames and Chubbies are given out by some collective Achewood Entity... and then get angry at Acheworld for being overly-generous/harsh. Then I remember that Acheworld is the Internetzorz and it takes one click and little thought to convey an opinion.

name: i_love_kate
text: Lie Bot in the seventh panel makes this a five. And Phillipe's muscle flexing.

name: molesticide
text: who?

name: waddlerz
text: Your mom

name: baryonyx
text: In which Phileppe fires up the ol' jostlin'-arms.

name: ctrl_z
text: This seems more like something Liebot would do.

name: ford
text: I think if Lie Bot told lies to make money, it'd be really impure somehow.

name: nicolae
text: Liebot uses lies for tormenting children.  Vlad uses falsities to somewhat repair the damage untold deceptions have wrought upon Philippe's psyche.  All is as it should be.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Liebot lies because the First Rule of Lying Robots is that Lying Robots lie.

name: deusoma
text: Appropriately, the Second Rule is that Lying Robots tell the truth all the time.

name: sharpdresseddan
text: Lie Bot makes this stip an easy 5.

name: kickstart
text: A comment left by kickstart was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by trialandterror, getawaykettle, Girdag)

name: stuart
text: Lie Bot is in this strip. Count the panels from left to right on the first row (you should get 4 ), then advance 3 more on the bottom row (4 3= 7 ). Lie Bot is in the seventh panel. He is facing the left side of the panel, and is speaking the text "What?" , in his phone conversation with Vlad .

name: kickstart
text: I seriously want to cry for what a crappy girl i am.

name: afterward
text: So who is James Brolin?

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Robots calling each other on the phone, no caller I.D. Inveterate lying robots at that. My god, a new genre of hilarity.

name: agentstinky
text: Oh man, I just watched the Dark Knight again and now I can't hear Vlad's voice as anybody but the Chechen guy in that movie.  "Who stupid enoff to steel from us?"

name: ravindra108
text: Vlad is willing to go the distance in order to close a sale.

name: kalethan
text: that's a buttload of comments for nobody to have referenced the Chuckle Bot inscription under Charles Bronson

name: woodenteeth
text: Panel 2. Empty frames. Vlad speaks, Phillippe imagines.

name: epicurus
text:
The joke is that Philippe is not actually that tough.

Also Lie Bot gets a taste of his own medecine. Vlad must have loved that.
